snippet.title: OLI - announcement trailer
snippet.description:
OLI is a short 2D puzzle-platformer game, with a thriller atmosphere. 

In this game you play as a child who needs to escape from scary monsters while passing through different locations in an inhospitable city.

This project is inspired by others games like Limbo and Little Nightmares.

Steam Page: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1794530/OLI/
